casebody.data:
PLASMAN
v.
DECCA FURNITURE (USA), INC., et al. 127P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 8, 2017 Matthew K. Rogers, Attorney at Law, Hickory, for Plasman, Christian G. Robert A. Muckenfuss, Attorney at Law, Andrew D. Atkins, Attorney at Law, Jodie H. Lawson, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Decca Furniture (USA), Inc., et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd of May 2017 by Defendants to Dismiss Portions of Petition for Discretionary Review that Are Untimely:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of June 2017."
